main event: An observer reported seeing a star-like object in the sky that appeared to be standing still, changing brightness, and flashing.
interesting points: The object was dimmer than surrounding stars,The sighting was observed for approximately 5 minutes,Multiple observers corroborated the sighting,The object was reported to the Tactical Air Command (TAC),The object was described as emitting its own light and appeared to maneuver in an erratic manner.
witness description: the observers reported seeing reddish-orange lights that hovered and pulsated
